import React, { useContext, useEffect, useRef } from "react"; import './Home.css'; import { ThemeContext } from "../context/ThemeContext"; function Home() { const { theme, changeTheme } = useContext(ThemeContext); const inputRef = useRef(null); useEffect(() => { const root = document.getElementById('root'); if(theme === 'light') { root.classList.remove('dark-mode'); root.classList.add('light-mode'); } else { root.classList.remove('light-mode'); root.classList.add('dark-mode'); } }, [theme]); return (

Welcome to Logee

Redefining Logistics for Modern Businesses

Revolutionizing Logistics with Innovation

At Logee, we connect businesses with advanced logistics solutions designed for efficiency, transparency, and growth. Whether you're a small business or a large enterprise, Logee enables smooth logistics operations by providing real-time insights, automated workflows, and cutting-edge tools to keep you ahead of the competition.

Our Key Features

Smart Routing

Optimize your delivery routes with our Smart Routing system, ensuring the fastest, most cost-effective paths for your goods. It automatically calculates the best routes based on traffic, weather, and fuel costs.

AI-Powered Forecasting

Use predictive analytics to forecast demand, manage inventory, and reduce supply chain disruptions. Our AI-powered tools help you make informed decisions for a smoother, more profitable operation.

Secure Digital Documentation

Safeguard all your logistics paperwork in one secure, digital location. From invoices to bills of lading, our platform ensures you stay organized and compliant with regulatory standards.

End-to-End Visibility

Track shipments in real-time from dispatch to delivery. With our comprehensive tracking system, you and your clients can always know the location and status of their shipments.

Experience Logee Today

Ready to enhance your logistics processes? Join Logee and take advantage of modern solutions that make your logistics smarter, faster, and more efficient.

); } export default Home;
